name: N.P.P.D. Rush: The Milk of Ultraviolet
summary:
So nauseous pines,
This noxious abyss,
I feed from the milk,
of ultra violet,
Yet I'm lost with you,
My floating twin,
You're the anchor to the drain,
but I am the key,
To nothing.

name: NPC Adventure: Post-Jam Edition
summary: Play as Greg the shopkeeper in his journey to take down the king and be part of the knight's story with upgraded battle mechanics, foes to fight, and friends to talk to.

name: NPPL Championship Paintball 2009
summary: NPPL: Championship Paintball 2009 (NPPL 09) is a first person paintball video game released for Xbox 360, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, and the Nintendo Wii. The game features multiple game modes, officially licensed gear,

name: Npc Simulator: Heroes Need Us
summary: NPC Simulator: Heroes Need Us is a game that allows you to immerse yourself in a medieval world in the role of a simple merchant. Trade, give quests, try to help your favorite heroes in their hard adventures and much more!

name: NPC Adventure
summary: Play as Greg, a lowly shopkeeper, on a RPG adventure to do the knight’s job and defeat the evil King in this game made for the Game maker’s Toolkit Jam 2023.

name: NPC Ville: The Story of the Blacksmith
summary: You're an NPC and the success of the game you live inside depends on you! As Aimee the blacksmith, it's up to you to give quests, craft weapons, make sales, assist with dangerous combat, and decorate the town as you work to keep the game—and your home—alive.

name: Npower Test Series
summary: As any decent batsman will tell you- you need concentration, timing and excellent shot selection to play a big innings. And you've got 12 overs and 10 wickets to build an unassailable total. At the end of the game, enter your score to see if you rate as one of the all time greats!

name: NPOZ The Game
summary:
A FPS game that you will shoot and kill people with diffrent gamemodes
you can level up and buy guns

name: Npool
summary: A classic game of pool on your Nintendo Switch – play with a friend or hone your skills vs an AI opponent.

name: NPCs
summary: Take the role of the lone player character in a land of NPCs hell bent on your destruction with this satirical take on modern culture. Click here for 10 reasons why Playable Characters are a threat to our democracy!

name: Npc Problems: Vertex Coloring
summary: In the world, there are some problems that cannot be solved by today's computers. Being necessary the use of artificial intelligence to get a good and fast solution. In the Npc Problems series, these problems are posed for you to solve. Can you overcome this challenge?

name: NPC Adventure: The Arena Update
summary: The Arena Update is an update to NPC Adventure to add an infinite battle mode alongside many new additions
